snippet.title: Far Cry 6: Meet the Villain: Antón Cinematic | #UbiForward
snippet.description:
Let Antón Castillo teach you a dictatorship lesson... With his 13-year-old son Diego following in his father’s bloody footsteps, Antón has the future of Yara clenched tightly in his hands.

Far Cry 6 will be available 7th October, 2021 on Xbox Series X, Xbox One, PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4,  Uplay, Uplay+, Epic Games and Stadia. Pre-order now at: https://farcry.com/buy

Follow Far Cry 6:
WEBSITE: https://www.farcry.com
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/farcrygame_europe 
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/farcrygamesuk
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/FarCryUK
